TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GetManifestCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the event of .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs> to obtain information about a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application after the deployment and application manifests have been downloaded.
## Examples The following code example shows how to use <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> to install a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application programmatically on a client machine.
[!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ActivationContext As ActivationContext
public: property ActivationContext ^ ActivationContext { ActivationContext ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the context for the current [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
Docs.value: An object representing the context for the current application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationIdentity As ApplicationIdentity
public: property ApplicationIdentity ^ ApplicationIdentity { ApplicationIdentity ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a description of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationManifest As XmlReader
public: property System::Xml::XmlReader ^ ApplicationManifest { System::Xml::XmlReader ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application manifest for this deployment.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use this variable to grab any information you need from the application manifest, such as a list of dependencies, trust information, and so on. For more information on the structure of this document, see [ClickOnce Application Manifest](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29570cec-4e53-4660-a850-abc4fa150243).
## Examples The following code example shows how to examine an application manifest from within a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> event handler to determine whether the application requires full trust by default.
[!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DeploymentManifest As XmlReader
public: property System::Xml::XmlReader ^ DeploymentManifest { System::Xml::XmlReader ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment manifest for this deployment.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCached As Boolean
public: property bool IsCached { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application is cached.
Docs.value: if the application is cached; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LogFilePath As String
public: property System::String ^ LogFilePath { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the location of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] error log.
Docs.value: A containing the location of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] error log.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProductName As String
public: property System::String ^ ProductName { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
Docs.value: A representing the product name of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, as stored in the assembly metadata of the application's main executable file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SubscriptionIdentity As String
public: property System::String ^ SubscriptionIdentity { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a string identifying the subscription.
Docs.value: A string with information identifying the subscription.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SupportUri As Uri
public: property Uri ^ SupportUri { Uri ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the location of a Web page users can visit to obtain product support for the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
Docs.value: A containing the value found in the supportUrl attribute of the deployment manifest's <description> tag. For more information, see [ClickOnce Deployment Manifest](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Version
public: property Version ^ Version { Version ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the version of the update for the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
Docs.value: A representing the version number contained within the downloaded manifest.
